meanings.definition: A metal plate used to join the ends of two rails in a track.
meanings.sent1: The fishplates connected the train tracks securely.
meanings.sent2: The workers installed the fishplates to link the railway sections.
meanings.sent3: The fishplates decided to have a race to see who could connect the tracks faster.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like the fishplates, seamlessly joining people together.
meanings.sent5: The shiny fishplates gleamed under the sun, holding the tracks in place.

meanings.definition: To secure or repair with fishplates.
meanings.sent1: He fishplates the broken rail to make it safe for trains.
meanings.sent2: The engineer fishplates the track after the maintenance work.
meanings.sent3: The mechanic fishplates the loose screws to prevent accidents.
meanings.sent4: She fishplates the friendship with kindness and understanding.
meanings.sent5: Fishplating the structure, he ensured its stability for years to come.
